alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:21AM EST until December 24 at 11:17PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport, Elliston, Petersburg, and Hazleton. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. Flooding may persist into Christmas Eve for portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins to flood several Pike County roads. Many of the following county roads begin to flood around this level...east of SR 57 include CR 750N...CR 600N and CR 1000E. Pike county road subject to flooding west of SR 57 include...CR 250 W...CR 400W...CR 675N...CR 700 N...CR 1000w...CR 900W...CR 700W and CR 775W. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Sunday /9:30 AM CST Sunday/ the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 18.4 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
